channel.title: Adding weapons specials
channel.description:
Well I just added SWAT's new emote system, but the thing is, I don't know how to add the new emotes to weapon specials. Does anyone know how, or can point me in the right direction of doing so? Any and all help is appreciated
-Thanks Zukyak

item.title: Adding weapons specials
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

Well he doesnt show you how to add it to a weapon he only tells how to add new specials. I need to know how to add it to a weapon

Read full topic

item.title: Adding weapons specials
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well unless I’m mistaken, SWAT tells you how, but what you do is find the special emote id, and add that as a new animation using the specified .dat file.

Read full topic
